sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_0586_til_post"> <x_0586_til_post action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <category display_value="Tricks">a8c6c0be1b8154908ed631d7dc4bcbef</category> <github_id>124</github_id> <github_url>https://github.com/iamkalai/SNTIL/issues/124</github_url> <message>Below script can be used to identify a host CI using IP address. Returns an array. Multiple CIs are returned if they have same IP. ```javascript gs.info(SNC.HostIdentificationUtil.findHostsByIP("172.21.161.92")); ``` **Note:** Works in global scope only.</message> <number>TIL0001132</number> <status>old</status> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-05-18 06:12:16</sys_created_on> <sys_id>b5aa3ed92faf055051dad5f62799b6d1</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-05-20 07:09:22</sys_updated_on> <title>Find host in CMDB using IP address</title> </x_0586_til_post> </record_update>
